Export.Routine:
#include Strix
#; ===== Dot-separated string macro's
#; The final piece of a dot-separated item #define ItemType(%item) $Piece(%item, ".", $Length(%item, "."))
#; Returns the lowercase last piece of a dot-separated string. #define NormalizedType(%item) $ZConvert($$$ItemType(%item), "l")
#; All but the final piece of a dot-separated string #define ItemName(%item) $Piece(%item, ".", 1, $Length(%item, ".")-1)
#; Convert the final piece of a dot-separated string to lowercase (in-place) #define NormalizeType(%item) Set $$$ItemType(%item)=$ZConvert($$$ItemType(%item),"l")
